name: Magic Pixel Picross
description: A game of numerical reasoning for practicing your logical thinking. A game of exploration and collection which may recall your childhood memories. A drawing game for you to paint your dreams freely.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: windows7,windows8,windows10 Processor: 64-bits Network: Broadband Internet connection
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
